name: Santa's Little Scrapper
description: It's Christmas time, which means Santa's workshop is about to get real busy. Unfortunately, he doesn't have enough materials for creating millions of electronic devices and gadgets for his customers. Fortunately, there's a nearby tundra full of belligerent robots that can be destroyed for materials! Get ready to scrap a bunch of robots w/ a giant candy cane across 4 brief levels. Playable with mouse and keyboard.
